EmailTemplate.name: QB Plus + QBFSP
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll Information Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear --,
Thank you for taking the time to discuss your payroll needs with me. I’m happy that I could introduce you to QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll and provide you with valuable information.
Feel free to call me at 800-920-4227 ext. XXXX if you have any questions.
QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll is an excellent choice for managing all your accounting and payroll needs in one place. With QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll, you'll have a team of US based payroll experts who will be with you every step of the way and guarantee your payroll setup, payday, and taxes are done right - all right inside QuickBooks.
QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll:
Track income and expenses Create estimates and invoices Sync bank accounts1 and apps Manage and pay bills Instant sales and profit reports Track inventory (only with Plus) Prepare and print 1099s (only with Plus) Run payroll in minutes: Just enter hours and we handle all the calculations. First class expert support: Call or chat with a US based payroll expert. Taxes done right: Payroll tax payments and forms handled for you (federal, state, local). Accuracy guarantee: Guaranteed error-free paychecks & payroll taxes.* Built inside QuickBooks: Payroll data flows directly to your books, can easily be shared with you accountant and works with your favorite apps.
QuickBooks Plus with Full Service Payroll Introductory Pricing:
Free 30 day trial: Try QuickBooks Full Service Payroll for free for 30 days. Then save 20% and pay only $110.96 per month plus $2 per employee per month for 12 months; $138.95 per month plus $2 per employee per month after 12 months. Buy Now to Save 50%: Buy Essentials + QuickBooks Full Service Payroll and save 50% and pay $69.47 per month plus $2 per employee per month for 12 months with no trial; $138.95 per month plus $2 per employee per month after 12 months. Great value: Unlimited payrolls and free direct deposit and W2s.
Please click to watch and learn more about QuickBooks Full Service Payroll.
Thank you for taking the time to review QuickBooks Full Service Payroll. If you have any further questions, please don’t hesitate to contact me. I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Regards,
Telesales Agent
Phone: 888-920-4227 Ext. XXXX
Email Address:
Intuit | Simplify the business of life
Monday thru Friday 8:00 AM PDT to 4:30 PM PST
ACCURACY GUARANTEE: We assume responsibility for paychecks based on the data you supply. As long as the information you provide us is accurate and on time, we guarantee that your paychecks will be accurate and on time - or we will give you the next monthly payroll fee for free and we will pay, if any, resulting bank fees. Inaccurate paycheck(s) claims must be submitted to Intuit within forty-five (45) days of the applicable pay date. We assume responsibility for federal and state payroll filings and payments directly from your account(s) based on the data you supply. As long as the information you provide us is correct and on time, and you have sufficient funds in your account, we'll file your tax forms and payments accurately and on time or we'll pay the resulting payroll tax penalties. Guarantee terms and conditions are subject to change at any time without notice.
TRIAL OFFER: First thirty (30) days of subscription to QuickBooks Online Plus with Payroll, starting from the date of enrollment, is free. After the first 30 days, you will receive a 20% discount on your monthly service fees for the first 12 months of service, followed by the then-current monthly rate. Your account will automatically be charged on a monthly basis until you cancel. Each employee you pay is an additional $2.00/month. Pay up to 150 employees. If you file taxes in more than one state, each additional state is $12.00/month. The 20% discount does not apply to additional employees and state tax filing fees. Offer is valid for new QuickBooks Online with Payroll customers only and is available for a limited time. Offer cannot be combined with any other QuickBooks Online or Payroll offers. No limit on the number of subscriptions ordered. If you add or remove services, your service fees will be adjusted accordingly. Sales tax may be applied where applicable. A valid credit card is required to continue using QuickBooks Online with Payroll. You may cancel the service at any time by calling 866-640-9987. Terms, conditions, pricing, special features, and service and support options subject to change without notice.
BUY NOW OFFER: 50% off QuickBooks Online Plus with Payroll for the first 12 months of service, starting from date of enrollment, followed by the then-current monthly rate.
Your account will automatically be charged on a monthly basis until you cancel. Each employee you pay is an additional $2.00/month. Pay up to 150 employees. If you file taxes in more than one state, each additional state is $12.00/month. The 50% discount does not apply to additional employees and state tax filing fees. To get 50% off you must select the Buy Now option. Offer not applicable with free trial. Offer valid for new QuickBooks Online customers only, during the promotional period. Promotional period starts March 9, 2015 and is available for a limited time only. Offer cannot be combined with any other QuickBooks Online or Payroll offers. No limit on the number of subscriptions ordered. If you add or remove services, your service fees will be adjusted accordingly. Sales tax may be applied where applicable. A valid credit card is required to continue using QuickBooks Online with Payroll. You may cancel the service at any time by calling 866-640-9987. Terms, conditions, pricing, special features, and service and support options subject to change without notice.
1 Online services vary by participating financial institutions or other parties and may be subject to application approval, additional terms, conditions, and fees.
Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement.
